content:
To rush, or not to dare,
That is the question...
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, looks like you've had quite a productive day!
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1003乐福_功能对话

content:
If there's anything fun going on,
Make sure to count me in! Hahaha~!
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1003乐福_功能对话

content:
[Crack—snap!]
I heard it,
The sound of something breaking,
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1003乐福_功能对话

content:
Is "wood collecting" today's fun activity?
You seem to be having a great time, and quite successful at it too.
Here's some <color=#8AAB4B>{奖励木材}</color> for you.
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1003乐福_功能对话

content:
As the founding fish who invested in this entertainment project,
don't forget to invite me along when you start playing,
hahaha~!
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1003乐福_功能对话

content:

I hope this <color=#8AAB4B>{奖励虫}</color>
can be of help to you.
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1003乐福_功能对话

content:
[Knock knock knock knock knock knock—ding!]
I'm imitating the sound of mining ore,
A sound you've heard many times around you today.
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1003乐福_功能对话

content:
Are you feeling itchy? I noticed you've been shaking trees all day.
Mobai once said that shaking trees might help with itching.
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1003乐福_功能对话

content:
Here's a <color=#8AAB4B>{奖励道具}</color> for you.
I hope it will be helpful.
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1003乐福_功能对话

content:
I can turn this branch into a back scratcher,
perfect for reaching those itchy spots you can't reach!
Hehehe~ Here, it's yours to keep, whether you need it or not!
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1003乐福_功能对话

content:
You seem to have been drifting off in another world today?
What a coincidence, me too!
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1003乐福_功能对话

content:
Here, take these <color=#8AAB4B>{奖励流光瓶}</color>.
I won them somewhere else,
they're yours now.
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1003乐福_功能对话

content:
Here's this <color=#8AAB4B>{奖励道具}</color>,
I made it myself, just for you.
It's my honor to provide props for your wonderful performance.
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1003乐福_功能对话

content: I've made up my mind! I want to give you all these <color=#8AAB4B>{奖励赶海生物}</color> that I worked so hard to collect. Would you teach me how to improve my beach-combing skills?
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1003乐福_功能对话

content:
Elegant conductor!
Your orchestration of these sea creatures' performance
is truly enchanting!
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1003乐福_功能对话

content:
An elegant performer must
take care of their delicate body~
Shaking trees all day might give you calluses.
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1003乐福_功能对话

content:
I understand, I understand,
Having fun in this world can be quite expensive,
Here are some <color=#8AAB4B>{奖励流光瓶}</color> for you.
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1003乐福_功能对话
